metadata.name: LSA PPL Protection Disabled Via Reg.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the usage of the "reg.exe" utility to disable PPL protection on the LSA process

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\reg.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('reg.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('system\\\\currentcontrolset\\\\control\\\\lsa')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' add ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /d 0')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /v runasppl ')))

output.summary: Detects the usage of the "reg.exe" utility to disable PPL protection on the LSA process
